title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: F. Q.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black and pink ink, brush and black ink, red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: F. Q.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram comprised of a black "F", the lower branch formed by a circle, intersecting a "Q" drawn in pink outline, the foot composed of narrow vertical lines.
